column6: Excuse me| but what was your name again?
When is your dad`s birthday again?
What car does your brother ahve again?

column5: LA에 있는 그 동네 이름이 뭐였죠?
column6: What was the name of that area in LA again?

column5: 내가 그 스테이크 집 이야기 안 했던가?
column6: I told you about that steak place | didn`t I?
Yeah| but what was the name of it again?
We`re leaving next week for Australia.

column5: 아| 맞아. 남동생 결혼식 때문이지| 맞지?
column6: Oh| that`s right. For your brother`s wedding| right?
Right. Little bro is getting married.
Congrates! When did you say you were coming back again?
